name: aitbc-zk-circuits
description: Zero-knowledge circuits for AITBC receipt attestation

scripts.contribute: snarkjs powersoftau contribute pot12_0000.ptau pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v
scripts.prepare: snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 pot12_0001.ptau pot12_final.ptau -v
scripts.generate-zkey: snarkjs groth16 setup receipt.r1cs pot12_final.ptau receipt_0000.zkey
scripts.contribute-zkey: snarkjs zkey contribute receipt_0000.zkey receipt_0001.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v
scripts.export-verification-key: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey receipt_0001.zkey verification_key.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify verification_key.json public.json proof.json
scripts.solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier receipt_0001.zkey verifier.sol

author: AITBC Team
